This game is like an addictive substance. You will either try it and hate it, try it and love it off  the bat, or try it and think its okay until you progressively want to play more and more of it. The community is 90% trash, hard fought victories are not gratifying enough due to bad ELO, yet narrow defeats can spell disaster for your rank. this game is oppressively aggravating and disheartening, but i cannot stop playing. I feel like my day isnt complete if i havent played a round or two of csgo because theres no other game just like it.
